comments.comment: Ape rata yahamagata ganimin rata eksesathkarannata darana me weyamata oba wahanse atulu mahasagaruwanata menma taruna pirisata yodabala yoda shakthiya lebewa. Teruwan saranai.
comments.author: Nelka nelka

replies.replyComment: Sadu sadu sadu budu saranai obawansata
Mata makata sahabagi Wenda thubunanam hodi me rassawath Akka bariuna
Ma rs a haboyonta denda na ape hamuduruwane
Hodi ape hamuduruwane API oba samagi
Daladaa... Hamuduruwange... Pihitai.... Gaurawaniiya.. Sanga sabawath,             Hamudawath, me rata palanaya kalauthuwa atha..
